Town of Lloyd, NY
PERFORMANCE CLUSTER

The Town of Lloyd

seeks to reduce the energy resources consumed and we are doing our part by reducing the lighting electric usage used by our dedicative sideway lighting. Recently, we have replaced our sidewalk lighting system with hi-tech LED luminaires that save at least 50% energy savings and are wirelessly reporting itâ€™s consumption to an advanced Cloud-Based Dashboard. The transparency is a value to our citizens as they see in real-time the societal benefit of using less energy but with equal or better lighting.
